chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product is iPhone 13 and it has the above problem:
We have placed an order with you and received an invoice. However, the invoice comes from a EU country outside of Germany, yet it still shows VAT. As we are a company, we need an invoice without VAT for our accounting or we also won't have to pay any VAT. Our VAT ID number is DE 813 077 142
Thank you very much for your help,

Dear ecomobile

Customer has the following problem with the invoice:

Invoice shows sales tax. As we are a company, we need an invoice without VAT for our bookkeeping and do not have to pay VAT. Our VAT ID number is DE 813 077 142

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the updated invoice.

Regards,
JY
